status.description: route status, 1 to enable, 0 to disable

key.description: the key of chash for dynamic load balancing

items.description: Nginx builtin variable name and value

status.description: ssl status, 1 to enable, 0 to disable

the key of chash for dynamic load balancing

schema.title: work with route or service object

max_body_size.description: max pipeline body size in bytes

allow_credential.description: allow client append credential. according to CORS specification,if you set this option to 'true', you can not use '*' for other options.

allow_headers.description: you can use '*' to allow all header when no credentials,'**' to allow forcefully(it will bring some security risks, be carefully),multiple header use ',' to split. default: *.

allow_methods.description: you can use '*' to allow all methods when no credentials and '**','**' to allow forcefully(it will bring some security risks, be carefully),multiple method use ',' to split. default: *.

allow_origins.description: you can use '*' to allow all origins when no credentials,'**' to allow forcefully(it will bring some security risks, be carefully),multiple origin use ',' to split. default: *.

expose_headers.description: you can use '*' to expose all header when no credentials,multiple header use ',' to split. default: *.

max_age.description: maximum number of seconds the results can be cached.-1 mean no cached,the max value is depend on browser,more detail plz check MDN. default: 5.

after_body.description: body after the modification of filter phase.

method.description: the method name in the grpc service.

encode_uri_params.title: Whether to escape the uri parameter

keep_headers.title: whether to keep the http request header

schema.title: work with route or service object

regex_uri.description: new uri that substitute from client uri for upstream, lower priority than uri property

body_base64.description: whether new body for response need base64 decode before return

key.description: the key of chash for dynamic load balancing

weight.description: used to split traffic between differentupstreams for plugin configuration

server_addr.description: default is $server_addr, you can specify your external ip address
